function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Selective approach to vector control","Impact":"Increased risk of vector-borne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement comprehensive vector control strategy","Technologies":"Insecticides, ITNs, long-lasting pyrethroid formulations","People":"Communities, high-risk groups","Owner":"Public sector, donors"},{"Description":"Emphasis on research over implementation","Impact":"Delayed deployment of effective vector control measures","Mitigation":"Allocate resources for both research and implementation","Technologies":"Research and development of new vector control tools","People":"Public health organizations, researchers","Owner":"Public health organizations, funders"},{"Description":"Community-level effect of ITNs","Impact":"Potential for over-reliance on ITNs as the sole control method","Mitigation":"Promote use of multiple vector control methods","Technologies":"Integrated vector management, combination of ITNs with other control measures","People":"Community members, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, researchers"}]}
